testimonials.text: Sahar did a great job while building our web site. She understood our requirements and paid attention to every detail. We don't hesitate to recommend her for any company who wants to build or renew its web site.

Sahar is a very talented engineer, I’ve had the pleasure of working with Sahar in various projects during her internship. Sahar's energy to make things happen was contagious and it helped us achieve great goals, And, of course, her work ethic is above description. Sahar would be a real asset for any position requiring software skills and comes with my sincere recommendation.
passionate person with a real problem solving attitude and a learning appetite.
